reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have to confess a slight bias... The owners of the hotel are great friends of mine.. but if it wasn't a great place to stay we wouldn't go every year that's for sure. Great location only minutes from the ski lift and you can, if the conditions are right, ski directly back to the hotel through the forest. There's a bus that stops directly outside the hotel if you don't want to walk.
reviews.title: Slightly Bias.. but I love it here

reviews.text: This is a 2 star hotel. It has everything you need. It's clean, warm and cosy. Offers good wholesome simple food on a you get what's on offer that night, there's no menu options unless you go a la carte! Food is accompanied by a half decent caraf of wine. BUT if you want something else, just ask, if they can do it they will. The food I've eaten here has always been tasty, well prepared, and traditional.
reviews.title: Dissapointing

reviews.text: Rooms are basic, warm and comfy. Plenty of hot water and if you get a room with a view ... well what a view to be had down the mountain.
reviews.title: Cold and sad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: La Ros is quiet, family oriented and very very french. The hotel can be quiet in the evenings but I've also seen the bar packed to the seams. There's some games to play and plenty of tables for a few drinks in a friendly bar before bedtime. You can also get a very nice vin chaud or hot choc in the bar to warm your fingers up.
reviews.title: A Winter Wonderland

reviews.text: The resort is fab. A few very good restaurants for dinner and lunch. A couple of bars and an opportunity for a little shopping.
reviews.title: Friendly welcome to a warm hotel with great food and convenient location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at this hotel several times, most recently this summer, though normally we go for the fab skiing in February.. The reason we go back is that the welcome is excellent. Nothing seems like too much bother for the staff and the rooms are clean and comfortable with terrific views. When we ate here in evenings the food was always 'tres French' and great value. We have no children, but my sister brought her kids here once and they loved it too.
reviews.title: Don't miss out on this place

reviews.text: I thought I should write a review as we were very pleased with the quality of this accomodation for the price and had a super stay.
reviews.title: Great Value
